title: [Large-scale] Experiential Human Resource Development and Planning Process Reflecting Cultural Context

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental HRM (Human Resource Management) concepts and organizational operations experience
context.additional_context: Exploring harmonization between Bhutan’s cultural characteristics (collectivism, Buddhist values) and modern HR systems

learning_goals: Learners can formulate human resource development plans considering cultural contexts with over 80% accuracy in simulation environments.
Through VR-based role-playing, learners can derive at least three team capacity-building strategies reflecting Bhutan’s collectivist societal characteristics.
Learners can write customized HR solution proposals by analyzing local business cases through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
